// Cannot support a seperate set of fragment shader input when per-sample shading:
3588 VULKAN ANDROID : dEQP-GLES31.functional.shaders.sample_variables.sample_pos.correctness.multisample_*_1 = FAIL
3588 VULKAN ANDROID : dEQP-GLES31.functional.shaders.sample_variables.sample_pos.correctness.multisample_*_2 = FAIL

// When ANGLE allows non-conformant features, imageAtomicExchange with r32f fails
5503 VULKAN ANDROID : dEQP-GLES31.functional.image_load_store.*.atomic.exchange_r32f* = FAIL
5503 SWIFTSHADER : dEQP-GLES31.functional.image_load_store.*.atomic.exchange_r32f* = SKIP

// NVIDIA failures on older drivers
5641 NVIDIA VULKAN : dEQP-GLES31.functional.copy_image.non_compressed.viewclass_32_bits.rgba8i_rgba8ui.texture3d_to_texture2d = SKIP
